source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_00<tab>Ponnixia just wants to take her mind off her troubles.
target: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のポニシアは、ミルクルートの隠し味を求めているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_01<tab>Ponnixia is finding fun to be elusive in recent days, and seeks to acquire dreamslime to enhance the potency of her beloved milkroot. Unfortunately, the much sought-after substance is being monopolized by selfish touched ones. Acquire four phials of dreamtoad ooze, either straight from the source or from the inebriated sylphs who are already partaking in its pleasures.
target: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_01<tab>ポニシアから依頼を受けた。シルフ領にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) A501 /var>」あるいは「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 4501 /var>」を討伐し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E101 /var>」を4つ集めよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained four phials of the unsightly yet highly treasured ooze. Deliver the goods to Ponnixia.
target: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_02<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E101 /var>」を集めることができた。ポニシアへ報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_03<tab>Ponnixia's eyes light up at the sight of the ooze. While the potent milkroot concoction will not resolve the many troubles that her people face, it will at least serve to return smiles to their faces.
target: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_SEQ_03<tab>ポニシアからの依頼を達成した。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88E101 /var>を塗ったミルクルートでゴキゲンになれば、悪い子シルフもブチのめせるのだそうだ。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_TODO_00<tab>Defeat dreamtoads or sylpheed sighs to obtain phials of dreamtoad ooze.
target: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) A501 /var>か<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 4501 /var>を討伐しガマ油を入手

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the phials of dreamtoad ooze to Ponnixia.
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab>Does walking one know what these ones love even more than milkroot? Milkroot mixed with dreamslime! Dreamslime makes milkroot thrice as fun, tee hee!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_000わたぴらは、ミルクルートがだいすきなのでふっち。
これに「」をひと塗りちて
噛み噛みすると、最高にイイ気分になれるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>But this one isn't having much fun today. Why? Because touched ones are herding slimy ones and hoarding all the dreamslime!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_001ほしくなったときに困らないように、
「」を集めてほちいのでふっち！
「」を倒せば、手に入るのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_002<tab>Walking one must punish touched ones and steal dreamslime─teach touched ones not to be greedy ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_002それから、トード飼いの「」も、
「」を持っているはずでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_003<tab>...Or just find slimy one and bring dreamslime to this one, so this one can forget one's worries.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_003ドリームトードは、みんなのものでふっち！
悪い子シルフにひとりぢめされちゃうまえに、
集めるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>Touched ones are herding slimy ones and hoarding all the dreamslime! Walking one must teach touched ones not to be greedy ones. Or just find slimy one and bring dreamslime to this one, so this one can forget one's worries.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_005悪い子シルフにひとりぢめされちゃうまえに
「」と「」を倒して、
「」を集めてほしいのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_010<tab>This one is having no fun, no fun at all! Did friendly one find dreamslime for this one?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_010悪い子シルフにひとりぢめされちゃうまえに
「」と「」を倒して、
「」を集めてほしいのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_012<tab>Friendly one brings dreamslime! At long last, this one can be smiling one again!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_012くんくんくん、はあ～いいニオイでふっち。
これをミルクルートにひと塗りして噛み噛みすれば……
想像するだけで、ゴキゲンになってきたでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_013<tab>These ones have many worries these days. Without milkroot and dreamslime, these ones would be frowning and brooding ones, and what would be the fun in that? Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL202_01268_PONNIXIA_000_013ありがとうでふっち！
ゴキゲンになれば、もう怖いものなしでふっち！
悪い子シルフもブチのめせるでふっち！！
